pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.2: Sp 2.940: _Vavatthānaṁ dassetvāti majjhe kāsāvaṁ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṁ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantīnaṁ anāpattīti attho_, “_Vavatthānaṁ dassetvā_ means there is no offense for those who lie down after putting an ocher cloth, a staff, or even a belt in the middle.”
